New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 39 points in 29 minutes, a career-high performance
Key Match Events: Oklahoma City closed the first quarter with a 12-0 spurt to lead 31-17
The Thunder then unleashed a 19-5 run over more than six minutes of the second to extend a 12-point lead to 55-29
Pre-Game Insights: The Thunder were determined to bounce back after their loss to the Cavaliers, showing no signs of a hangover
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder outscored the Knicks 68-36 over consecutive quarters
The Knicks were booed multiple times in the first half due to poor performance
